update advertisement set title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ad_describle = #{adDescrible,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT}, ad_status = #{adStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, image_url = #{imageUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, app_version = #{appVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_man = #{createMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modify_man = #{modifyMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.sql: a.id, a.title, a.name, a.ad_describle AS adDescrible, a.type, a.ad_status AS adStatus, a.image_url AS imageUrl, a.url, DATE_FORMAT(a.start_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') AS startTime, DATE_FORMAT(a.end_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') AS endTime, DATE_FORMAT(a.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') AS createTime, DATE_FORMAT(a.modify_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') AS modifyTime, a.create_man AS createMan, a.modify_man AS modifyMan, a.remark, GROUP_CONCAT(v.app_version SEPARATOR ' / ') AS appVersion
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM advertisement a LEFT JOIN ad_app_version ad ON a.`id` = ad.`advertisement_id` LEFT JOIN app_version v ON ad.`app_version_id` = v.`id` WHERE a.type = 0 AND a.ad_status = 1 and a.name like concat('%',#{name},'%') and a.start_time >= #{startTime} and a.end_time <= #{endTime} GROUP BY a.id LIMIT ${iDisplayStart},${iDisplayLength}

select count(1) from ( SELECT
FROM advertisement a LEFT JOIN ad_app_version ad ON a.`id` = ad.`advertisement_id` LEFT JOIN app_version v ON ad.`app_version_id` = v.`id` WHERE a.type = 0 AND a.ad_status = 1 and a.name like concat('%',#{name},'%') and a.start_time >= #{startTime} and a.end_time <= #{endTime} GROUP BY a.id) a

select
from advertisement a LEFT JOIN ad_app_version ad ON a.`id` = ad.`advertisement_id` LEFT JOIN app_version v ON ad.`app_version_id` = v.`id` WHERE a.id = #{id}
SELECT id,app_version as appVersion FROM app_version
mapper.insert: insert into ad_app_version ( advertisement_id, app_version_id, create_time, modify_time, create_man, modify_man,remark) values ( #{id}, #{appVersionId}, now(), #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
